channel.title: Comments for page "Fur Square"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fur Square"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
appraised 50, got
31 regular 62%
16 quality 32%
3 wasteland 6%
Thought 'no harm', so here you go :)
edit: I did another fifty, bringing the total to 100:
60% regular
36% quality
4% wasteland …seems I was much less lucky than you :(

another 50 (seems like this isn't helping anyone so I guess this'll be my last…)
36 regular (72%)
9 quality (18%)
5 wasteland (10%)
making my personal total 64/30/6

item.title: Fur Appraisal
item.content:encoded:
In order to estimate the approximate distribution of fur types, here is some appraisal information I've gathered. If enough people add to this with their own appraisals, we can get accurate estimates.

354 Furs appraised
241 Regular (68%)
84 Quality (24%)
29 Wasteland (8%)
